my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, sudah lama kita berjalan. Mari berhenti dan cari makanan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat sepotong tembikai di atas bangku tersebut!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user, boleh bantu kami mengambil sedikit tembikai tersebut?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Huruf Hijaiyah pertama kita untuk hari ini telah ditemui!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, we've been walking for a while.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We should stop to look for something to eat.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, I think I see a watermelon up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, I think I see a watermelon up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user, can you please help fetch that watermelon.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You've also found the first Hijaiyah letter for this path.
